                    throws IOException

        Parameters:

                                    UserManager um)
                             throws IOException
        Checks if the token belongs to a valid user account.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        um - the UserManager containing the user database
        Returns:
        true if the user exists, otherwise false
        Throws:

      • reqLoginValid

        public static boolean reqLoginValid(HTTPServer.Request req,
                                    HTTPServer.Response resp,
                                    UserManager um)
                             throws IOException
        Checks if the token belongs to a valid user account. Replies with a 403 error, closes the stream and returns false if the token is invalid.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        resp - the response to write to
        um - the UserManager containing the user database
        Returns:
        true if the user exists, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IOException

      • reqLoginValid

        public static boolean reqLoginValid(HTTPServer.Request req,
                                    HTTPServer.Response resp,
                                    UserManager um,
                                    HashSet<String> contextFilter,
                                    boolean isBlackList)
                             throws IOException
        Checks if the token belongs to a valid user account. Replies with a 403 error, closes the stream and returns false if the token is invalid. Includes a filter for batch processing. If blacklisted, only logged in users can access resources in the filter.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        resp - the response to write to
        um - the UserManager containing the user database
        isBlackList - if the context filters are a white or black list
        contextFilter - the contexts to filter
        Returns:
        true if the user exists, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IOException

      • addToServer

        public static void addToServer(SHTMLServer server,
                               UserManager um,
                               String websiteTitle,
                               String homePageAddress)
        Adds the relevant pages and services to allow user accounts.
        Parameters:
        server - the server to which the resources are added
        um - the UserManager to use
        websiteTitle - the title of the website, it is displayed on the login page
        homePageAddress - the context to forward traffic to after login is validated. must start with a "/"

        public static void printMessage(String line)
